JobFullDesc: At Facebook, we pride ourselves on making data-informed decisions. This includes not only decisions we make about our platform, which serves over 2 billion users, but also how we learn more about our most valuable asset – our people. For instance, we use data to understand how to hire top talent, to ensure our people are engaged, and to support diversity.We’re looking for an experienced employee listening professional to manage our Employee Listening team, which resides in our People Analytics and Workforce Strategy organization. This team is at the forefront of guiding and designing the employee listening strategies and practices across Facebook. In this role, you will lead a talented team and serve as an active partner with HR and functional leaders to shape and deliver on our overall employee listening strategy. You’ll help develop and refine people processes to make an exceptional workplace even better.Lead an employee listening team ensuring the team is productive, engaged, and thriving in their
